data.title: Scott Webster, PharmD, Chief Pharmacy Officer
data.meta_description: Scott Webster, Pharm.D. joined the Grand Peaks team in March of 2020. Before joining our team He was a Rexburg pharmacy manager for 13 years.
data.text:
The Care Team

Scott Webster, Pharm.D. joined the Grand Peaks team in March of 2020. Scott grew up in Saint Anthony and graduated from South Fremont High School. He then served an LDS mission in Alabama where he learned to work hard and serve others. Upon returning, he attended Ricks College and graduated with an Associateâ€™s Degree in Sports Medicine in 2000. While going to school Scott Webster started working at Walmart pharmacy as a technician. After a short time working there, he decided to pursue a career in pharmacy. He attended pharmacy school at Idaho State University and graduated in 2005. He has worked at various Walmart pharmacy locations throughout East Idaho and the Magic Valley for the past 20 years. His experience also included being the Walmart pharmacy manager in Rexburg for the past 13 years.

Scott loves the outdoors and spending time with his wife and four daughters. His family likes to ride horses and rodeo together. He also likes to hunt, fish, camp, play sports and stay active. In addition to these activities, he likes to build things out of wood, spend time in the yard and garden.

With his years of experience as a pharmacist, he hopes to be able to provide meaningful service and help to the people of the community he grew up in and loves.
